comment: /**  * Checks the format of an internal index and returns true if the index is up to date or false if upgrade is required  */
code: /**  * Checks the format of an internal index and returns true if the index is up to date or false if upgrade is required  */ public static boolean checkInternalIndexFormat(IndexMetaData indexMetaData) {     return indexMetaData.getSettings().getAsInt(IndexMetaData.INDEX_FORMAT_SETTING.getKey(), 0) == EXPECTED_INDEX_FORMAT_VERSION. }
